description: create a content type in a light module
option-app-description: configure the app and associated workspace by creating a new app or choosing an existing one (recommended plural)
option-lightModule-description: set the light module for the content type; defaults to the directory specified in mgnl.config.js file
option-prototypeDir-description: use the specified path to the custom prototype templates directory as the prototype source for content type creation

option-prototype-description.with-prototypes: select a prototype for content-type creation; available prototypes include: [{{prototypes}}]
option-prototype-description.no-prototypes: select a prototype for content-type creation; provided prototype-dir: "{{path}}" doesn't exist, no prototypes available
